## Laplace Transform: Simplifying Math Problems

The Laplace transform is a math tool named after Pierre-Simon Laplace. It changes a function from the time domain (real numbers) to the "s-domain" (complex numbers). This makes solving differential equations and analyzing systems easier, because multiplication and division become simpler than time-domain calculations like differentiation.

Think of it like converting a difficult math problem into a simpler one with building blocks. Once you solve the problem in the s-domain, you can use the inverse Laplace transform to get the original answer back.
